alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:39AM MST until February 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light snow expected tonight with heavier snow showers Monday. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches from 5,000 to 7,000 feet and up to 10 inches above 7,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At this time the period of heaviest snowfall looks to be from Monday morning into the early evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains of Graham and Greenlee Counties including Hannagan Meadow
